Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 79th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1971...
Released by San Francisco on 5/21/1973...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 3/1/1975 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 8/16/1977 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/24/1978 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/26/1980 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/8/1980 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/22/1981 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/2/1982, off Antonio Pollorena (CAL)...
Injured on 6/5/1984 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1987, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/1/1988 to a 1-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Injured on 5/1/1989 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Texas in 1989...
Traded from Texas to Cincinnati on 1/31/1991 (Going to CIN: SS C. Reynolds, P G. Cadaret. Going to TEX: SS G. Hoffman)...
